0001000111111010 1010100010011101 0 -> sum: 1011101010010111, cout: 0
0111010111110010 1101111100010100 1 -> sum: 0101010100000111, cout: 1

1100100010100001 1110010111111111 0 -> sum: 1010111010100000, cout: 1
0010011010111000 1000000010001010 0 -> sum: 1010011101000010, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
